name: Nmap
summary: Network mapper and port scanner used for inventorying lab subnets.
description: Simulated package metadata for the Nmap network scanning toolkit.

versions.notes: Latest stable release with NSE script refresh and fingerprint updates.
Includes performance improvements for large IPv6 sweeps.
Long-term support build used in introductory labs.

name: Metasploit Framework
summary: Penetration testing framework with extensive module catalog.
description: Simulated framework metadata showcasing common training builds.

versions.notes: Ships with refreshed module metadata and simulated content pack.
Adds mock automation helpers for guided exercises.
Baseline used for long-running labs and capture-the-flag scenarios.

name: Hydra
summary: Parallelized login cracker supporting common network services.
description: Simulated Hydra builds for offline credential testing exercises.

versions.notes: Introduces mock progress reporting API used in the portfolio demo.
Adds simulated modules for RDP and VNC credential replay exercises.
Stable training build with reduced output for classroom walkthroughs.

name: Wireshark
summary: Packet analyzer with dissectors for numerous protocols.
description: Simulated Wireshark packages used for packet analysis labs.

versions.notes: Latest dissector refresh with canned PCAP samples.
Adds simulated WPA handshake analyzer for workshop content.
Long-term maintenance release used across archived labs.

name: John the Ripper
summary: Offline password cracking utility with extensive hash support.
description: Simulated John the Ripper builds packaged for local lab environments.

versions.notes: Adds wordlist staging helpers used in the desktop demo.
Includes simulated GPU cracking hooks for explanation overlays.
Reference build used for reproducible step-by-step labs.
